description: The main component for a Tic Tac Toe game, managing the game state and rendering the game interface.

methods.name: calculateWinner
methods.description: Calculates the winner of the Tic Tac Toe game based on the current state of the squares.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles the click events for the squares, updating the game state and switching players.

methods.name: handleReset
methods.description: Resets the game to its initial state.
